name: grimness
content:
grimness noun [U]
(WITHOUT HOPE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the feeling or state of having no hope: NBC's reporter noted the grimness of the rescue effort. I make a comment today about the grimness of our outlook.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was smiling but with such grimness that she began to regret her decision to come. I'm also struck by the grimness in people's faces.

grimness noun [U]
(SERIOUSNESS)
